Label.Name: msgNoBarCodeWideSplit
Label.Visible: eval((o.Language == 'French' && (o.Element('ProduceOption') == 1 || o.Element('BakeryOption') == 1 || o.Element('SaladBarOption') == 1) && (o.Element('ScreenName') == 'NO_BARCODE' || o.Element('ScreenName') == 'WEIGHT_REQUIRED' || o.Element('ScreenName') == 'SECURITY_ON_SCANNER')) || (o.Language == 'French' && o.Element('NoBarcodeOption') == 1 && (o.Element('ScreenName') == 'WEIGHT_REQUIRED' || o.Element('ScreenName') == 'QUANTITY_REQUIRED' || o.Element('ScreenName') == 'SECURITY_ON_SCANNER')))

Text.Name: DisplayRobotDir
Text.Expression: eval(o.GetReg('EASType') == 0 ? 'NA' : o.GetReg('EASType') == 7 ? 'NA' : o.GetReg('ScannerScaleType') == 2 ? 'NA' : o.GetReg('ScannerScaleType') == 7 ? 'NA' : o.GetReg('Left') == 0 ? 'Droit' : o.GetReg('Left') == 1 ? 'Gauche' : 'NA')

Button.Name: BTN_CASHIER_PP_DONE
Button.ClickExecute: if (o.CurrentState == 'SCAN_LDMODE_PWORD' && o.GetRegPath('Robot\\Cashier','Manager') != o.Element('CashierPinpad_VAL') && (o.Element('MgrFunction') == 'TurnMgrKey' || o.Element('MgrFunction') == 'AccessMgrFtns')) {o.SetElement('CashierPinpad_VAL', ''); o.SetElement('EnteredPwordOK', 0);} else {o.SetElement('EnteredPwordOK', 1);}
